dcterms:creator: D. Dov
R. Talmon
I. Cohen
dcterms:description: An audio database constructed from recordings of 11 different speakers reading aloud an article, containing sequences of speech and silence, processed to identify speech presence or absence.
dcterms:title: Audio database presented in [12]

dcterms:creator: D. Dov
R. Talmon
I. Cohen
dcterms:description: Clean audio signals contaminated by 42 different pairs of additive stationary and non-stationary noises, including various types of noise such as white Gaussian noise and transient sounds.
dcterms:title: Clean audio signals contaminated by 42 different pairs of additive stationary and non-stationary noises

dcterms:creator: D. Dov
R. Talmon
I. Cohen
dcterms:description: A training set specifically designed for the deep encoder-decoder architecture used in voice activity detection, utilizing the audio database.
dcterms:title: DED training set

dcterms:creator: D. Dov
R. Talmon
I. Cohen
dcterms:description: A classifier training set used to train the support vector machine for separating speech presence and absence based on error measures.
dcterms:title: Classifier training set

dcterms:creator: D. Dov
R. Talmon
I. Cohen
dcterms:description: A test set used to evaluate the performance of the voice activity detection algorithm, ensuring no overlap with the training sets.
dcterms:title: Back to end test set
